thread.section_title: SignUpGenius Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SignUpGenius | signupgenius.com
thread.title: carrie pipkin

author: carrie pipkin
title: carrie pipkin
text:
This product works great for creating sign ups for our small groups. I am able to see who and how many are coming and allow them to sign up for what to bring. I can create a sign up fairly quickly and love that I can copy old sign ups and edit those.
I wish it would remind me to save when I move from page to page.
Also the switch from a standard sign up to being able to tell how many people from each family is coming looks more like an advertisement so I miss it every time
